name: NamelessRoguelite
description:
A 3d zelda inspired roguelite, with pixelated graphics, permadeath and dual-wielding combat.

Controls

-WASD: move

-Spacebar: roll

-LMB: melee attack (combos)

-RMB: ranged attack

-F: activate the active ability of the Gem

-Esc: pause game

-TAB: zoom on map

The game is still in early development, if you want to follow it through, you can join the  Discord server, or follow me on  Twitter.
